title: Establishing Educational Innovation Strategies Through MOOC Research Trend Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online education and educational systems, with foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Focused on analyzing MOOC research trends for science education administrators/leaders to derive strategies applicable to corporate education systems.

learning_goals: Learners can classify MOOC research trends into three dimensions (Presage, Process, Product) using template analysis methodology.
Based on the analysis results, a MOOC-based educational strategy suitable for the corporate environment can be proposed.
By designing measures to enhance learning engagement and quality management, educational effectiveness can be measured.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
